titleStmt.title: The burgess ticket of Buckhaven given to Alexander Bryson; within the college thereof, upon the 32 day of Julius Cæsar, 1698 years. Suits calld, and the court lawfully fenced, by Mother Greg.
titleStmt.author: Mother Greg.
Wilson, Gideon fl. 1698.

notesStmt.note: Place of publication from National Library of Scotland.
Signed at end: "Gideon Wilson, cls burgi di Buckhaven."
Reproduction of original in: National Library of Scotland.
